document.full_text: the senator, james m. inhofe, an oklahoma republican, touched down, became airborne again and hopped over a group of construction workers, and then touched down again, according to the federal aviation administration.
document.title: senator took remedial flying instruction after landing on closed runway
lines_and_colors: the senator, james m. inhofe, an oklahoma republican, touched down, became airborne again and hopped over a group of construction workers, and then touched down again, according to the federal aviation administration.
